Description: Test alert behavior for a temperature below alert threshold, expecting no alert failure count increment.
Notes: Confirms no alert failure for low temperature, should return 200 and not increment.

Description: Test alert behavior for a high temperature alert, expecting no increment when stub returns 200.
Notes: Ensures normal alert does not increase alert_failure_count when network returns 200.

Description: Test alert failure count increments when network alert fails with a non-200 return code.
Notes: Overrides stub to return 500, confirming increment in alert_failure_count on network failure.
